resources.string: The Indicators library supports different indicator types out of the box.
The PageIndicatorView displays selected and unselected drawables for all pages.
The PageNumberView displays the current page and the page count as text.
All the indicators can be added to the PageIndicators layout directly.
Or just be registered manually as a observers with the PageIndicators layout.
Also the page scroll position can be observed with a PageScrollObserver.

Find the Indicators library on GitHub
